mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_pro( order_info_id, product_name, product_price, purchase_price, num, total, orde_by, norms1, norms2, norms3, product_id, order_kuncun, all_number, now_number, date )VALUE ( #{order_info_id}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{purchase_price}, #{num}, #{total}, #{orde_by}, #{norms1}, #{norms2}, #{norms3}, #{product_id}, #{order_kuncun}, #{all_number}, #{now_number}, now() )

INSERT INTO order_pro( order_info_id, product_name, product_price, purchase_price, num, total, orde_by, norms1, norms2, norms3, product_id, order_kuncun, date )VALUE
(#{order_info_id},#{item.product_name},#{item.product_price},#{item.purchase_price},#{item.num},#{item.total},"0",#{item.norms1},#{item.norms2},#{item.norms3},#{item.product_id},#{item.order_kuncun},now())
mapper.select: SELECT order_pro_id, order_info_id, replace(product_name,"XINg"," ") as product_name, product_price, num, total, norms1, norms2, norms3, product_id, order_kuncun FROM order_pro WHERE order_pro_id=#{order_pro_id}

select op.*, p.product_img from( SELECT order_pro_id, order_info_id, replace(product_name,"XINg"," ") as product_name, product_price, purchase_price, num, total, norms1, norms2, norms3, product_id, order_kuncun, all_number, now_number FROM order_pro WHERE order_info_id=#{order_info_id} ORDER BY orde_by ) op LEFT JOIN product p on op.product_id=p.product_id

SELECT count(1) as count FROM ( SELECT op.order_info_id FROM order_pro op LEFT JOIN order_info o on o.order_info_id=op.order_info_id WHERE op.product_id = #{product_id} and op.status='0' and op.revokes='0' GROUP BY o.customer_id ) o

SELECT o.total, o.count, o.customer_id, p.product_id, replace(p.product_name,"XINg"," ") as product_name, p.product_price, p.purchase_price, p.production_enterprise, p.product_img, p.norms1, p.norms2, p.norms3, c.`name`, c.owe FROM ( SELECT sum(total) AS total, count(1) as count, op.product_id, o.customer_id FROM order_pro op LEFT JOIN order_info o on o.order_info_id=op.order_info_id WHERE op.product_id = #{product_id} and op.status='0' and op.revokes='0' GROUP BY o.customer_id limit #{SHU1},10 ) o LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = o.product_id LEFT JOIN customer c on c.customer_id=o.customer_id
where POSITION(#{name} IN c.name)
SELECT SUM(num) as num FROM order_pro where product_id=#{product_id} and revokes='0'
SELECT SUM(total) as money FROM order_pro where product_id=#{product_id} and revokes='0'

SELECT op.order_pro_id, op.order_info_id, replace(op.product_name,"XINg"," ") as product_name, op.product_price, op.num, op.total, op.norms1, op.norms2, op.norms3, op.product_id, op.order_kuncun, oi.name, oi.phone, oi.total_money, oi.owe_money, oi.money, oi.discount_money, oi.date FROM order_pro op LEFT JOIN order_info oi on oi.order_info_id=op.order_info_id WHERE op.order_info_id=#{order_info_id} and oi.revokes='0' ORDER BY orde_by

SELECT SUM(o.profit), SUM(o.receivable), SUM(o.num) FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(nums * purchase_price), 0) AS receivable, IFNULL(SUM(nums * product_price), 0) AS profit, IFNULL(SUM(nums), 0) AS num, product_id FROM order_kuncun where store_id=#{store_id} and revokes='0' and product_id in ( select product_id from product where store_id=#{store_id}; ) ) o

SELECT op.*, oi.`name`, oi.phone, oi.money, oi.owe_money, oi.total_money FROM ( SELECT order_pro_id, order_info_id, replace(product_name,"XINg"," ") as product_name, product_price, num, total, norms1, norms2, norms3, product_id, order_kuncun FROM order_pro where product_id=#{product_id} and revokes='0' ORDER BY date DESC limit #{SHU1},10 ) op LEFT JOIN order_info oi on oi.order_info_id=op.order_info_id
SELECT count(1) as count FROM order_pro where product_id=#{product_id} and revokes='0'

SELECT order_pro_id, order_info_id, replace(product_name,"XINg"," ") as product_name, product_price, num, total, norms1, norms2, norms3, product_id, order_kuncun, all_number, now_number FROM order_pro WHERE order_info_id=#{order_info_id} and product_id=#{product_id}
select * from order_pro where order_info_id = #{order_info_id} and revokes = 0
